attributes.action: only pay travel expenses to MPs MEPs and Civil Servants when they are using public transport rather than private cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all the journeys made by government employees and representatives were by public transport we would have an immediate reduction in the number of cars on the road in any given day.  This incentive would have positive effects on the environment and encourage direct improvements in the public transport system.
